bean.read: select id as "id", code as "code", name as "name", native_name as "nativeName", rtl as "rtl", creation_date as "creationDate", last_modified as "lastModified" from io_language where id = ${this.id}
bean.read-list: select id as "id" from io_labellocale where language_id = ${this.id}
bean.read: select id as "id" from io_language where lower(code) = lower(${this.code})
select id as "id" from io_language where lower(name) = lower(${this.name})
select id as "id" from io_language where lower(native_name) = lower(${this.nativeName})
bean.update: update io_language set code = ${this.code}, name = ${this.name}, native_name = ${this.nativeName}, rtl = ${this.rtl}, last_modified = ${this.now()} where id = ${this.id}
bean.create: insert into io_language ( [#if this.bean.id??]id,[/#if] code, name, native_name, rtl, creation_date, last_modified ) values ( [#if this.bean.id??]${this.id},[/#if] ${this.code}, ${this.name}, ${this.nativeName}, coalesce(${this.rtl},0), [#if this.bean.creationDate??]${this.creationDate}[#else]${this.now()}[/#if], [#if this.bean.lastModified??]${this.lastModified}[#else]${this.now()}[/#if] )
